# Utilities

Copy-paste utility functions for common operations.

import { Cards, Card } from 'nextra/components'

<Cards>

## Usage

Place utilities in your `lib` or `utils` folder:

```
src/
└── lib/
    ├── cn.ts
    ├── formatters.ts
    ├── string.ts
    └── index.ts
```

Export from a barrel file:

```typescript
// lib/index.ts
export { cn } from './cn';
export { formatDate, formatRelativeTime } from './formatters';
export { formatCurrency } from './formatters';
export { slugify, truncate, capitalize } from './string';
```
